author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amarillo Announces The Extension And Amendment Of Its Gold-Linked Credit Facility
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Amarillo Gold Corp:
* AMARILLO ANNOUNCES THE EXTENSION AND AMENDMENT OF ITS GOLD-LINKED CREDIT FACILITY
* AMARILLO GOLD CORP - AMARILLO AND ITS LENDING GROUP HAVE AGREED TO EXTEND MATURITY OF FACILITY FROM JULY 31, 2019 TO JUNE 30, 2022 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
